creator: nagoya.apache.org@lasius.com
text:
Note: Not a bug in Apache but in Zonealarm, posting here to help others
diagnose. I know ZA mangles stuff...

On localhost testing server some pages and pictures were not being drawn
properly. Consistently affected certain files e.g. stylesheet.css. problems the
same in mozilla and ie, used PuTTY to query the server directly.

---8<---
GET /catalog/stylesheet.css HTTP/1.1
Host: local.xxxxx.com

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Tue, 01 Jun 2004 17:56:46 GMT
Server: Apache/2.0.47 (Win32) PHP/4.3.3
Last-Modified: Thu, 27 May 2004 17:37:31 GMT
ETag: "13ef-1803-72044cc0"
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Content-Length: 6147
Content-Type: text/css

font-weight: bold;
}

TD.fieldValue {
.
.
.
---8<---
The bit starting font-weight is about 70% through the file, confirmed that local
file and filesystem is intact. Nothing showing in error log, access log shows
127.0.0.1 - - [01/Jun/2004:18:56:46 +0100] "GET /catalog/stylesheet.css
HTTP/1.1" 200 6147

Solution... Shutdown ZoneAlarm Pro (5.0.590.015) requeried, worked fine.

---8<---
GET /catalog/stylesheet.css HTTP/1.1
Host: local.xxxxx.com

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Tue, 01 Jun 2004 18:21:24 GMT
Server: Apache/2.0.47 (Win32) PHP/4.3.3
Last-Modified: Thu, 27 May 2004 17:37:31 GMT
ETag: "13ef-1803-72044cc0"
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Content-Length: 6147
Content-Type: text/css

/*
  $Id: stylesheet.css,v 1.1.4.2 2004/05/27 17:37:31 Stephen Exp $

  osCommerce, Open Source E-Commerce Solutions
  http://www.oscommerce.com

  Copyright (c) 2003 osCommerce

  Released under the GNU General Public License
*/

.boxText { font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; }
.errorBox { font-family : Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size : 10px; backgrou
.
.
.
---8<---

Which is the correct head of the content.

Going to try later versions of apache and earlier versions of ZA now.

Steve.
